channel.title: PvPscapez V5 Edited Trisidiax take little credit
channel.description:
[URL=http://minus.com/lbylHvrlUpTtqt][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbylHvrlUpTtqt.png[/img][/URL]
this is my edited version of trisidiax With alot of fixes infact. In my mind more stable than the real trisidiax source and More activity people can do =) Lost All hope for Hosting Cause people downed me and much more :(
http://uppit.com/3ph3if6p03lb/Zipit.zip
Perfect switching Fixed alot of bugs and deadlocks And more Working MoneyPouch! dupe in the MoneyPouch Drop Dupe Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 LevelPoints with a Store custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Took out player shops As its a shit feature Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim 120 Dungeoneering The Arrow Dupe Glitch Server AutoSave Lag when banking all Player Titles Auto-Server Save UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable) KillStreak Point System Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1) Custom Npc Shops Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Better Prayer Better Eco Tokkul Shop 2b Ticket Exchange timedmute timedban Player Clipping Npc clipping Region clipping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regular ones) Most Single and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Made a lot of things Fixed Freezing in Wise old man Perfect switching Double XP Ring dropped by zammy boss![/SIZE][/B]
[URL=http://minus.com/l3f6dEhlD5Gv6][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j3f6dEhlD5Gv6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbre9q27vUfAaB][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbre9q27vUfAaB.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lDxT11dcbEsoy][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jDxT11dcbEsoy.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l76VfG8Q5y77l][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j76VfG8Q5y77l.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lhsSiGC7iOQLs][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jhsSiGC7iOQLs.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lCCijvBnK4KhM][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jCCijvBnK4KhM.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbbqxgkYSpWxdn][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbbqxgkYSpWxdn.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l2MTayFqH1hTN][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j2MTayFqH1hTN.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lncam0Uyyghfv][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jncam0Uyyghfv.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: PvPscapez V5 Edited Trisidiax take little credit
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

this is my edited version of trisidiax With alot of fixes infact.
In my mind more stable than the real trisidiax source and More activity people can do =)
Lost All hope for Hosting Cause people downed me and much more

http://uppit.com/3ph3if6p03lb/Zipit.zip

Perfect switching
Fixed alot of bugs and deadlocks
And more
Working MoneyPouch!
dupe in the MoneyPouch
Drop Dupe
Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe!
custom items with 711 model header
[Server] Announcement when you get 99
LevelPoints with a Store
custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands
Lottery, [Lottie]
Took out player shops As its a shit feature
Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery
Added 2 Starters Per Ip
Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in
Fixed Total Level
Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim
120 Dungeoneering
The Arrow Dupe Glitch
Server AutoSave
Lag when banking all
Player Titles
Auto-Server Save
UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable)
KillStreak Point System
Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1)
Custom Npc Shops
Added in dice command for Donator+
New Interfaces
Better Prayer
Better Eco
Tokkul Shop
2b Ticket Exchange
timedmute
timedban
Player Clipping
Npc clipping
Region clipping
Summoning Working
Fixed Charms
Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regular ones)
Most Single and Double doors working the way they need to
Awesome Donator Benifits
Made a lot of things
Fixed Freezing in Wise old man
Perfect switching
Double XP Ring dropped by zammy boss![/SIZE][/B]









Read full topic
